mapper.select: SELECT m.*, a.anum, a.fname , s.snum,s.sname, s.bookable, s.max_ppl, s.price , r.rnum,r.nickname, r.content, r.score, r.regdate FROM camping_main m LEFT JOIN c_attach a ON m.cnum=a.cnum LEFT JOIN camping_site s ON m.cnum = s.cnum LEFT JOIN review r ON m.cnum = r.cnum WHERE m.cnum=#{cnum}
SELECT AVG(score) FROM review WHERE cnum=#{cnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking(bnum, cnum, unum,snum,sname, checkin, checkout, ppl, ttlprice) VALUES(#{bnum}, #{cnum}, #{unum},#{snum},#{sname},#{checkin}, #{checkout}, #{ppl}, #{ttlprice})
mapper.select: SELECT m.cnum, m.cname, m.address, b.bnum,b.sname, b.checkin, b.checkout, b.ttlprice,b.ppl , u.unum, u.name, u.email, u.phone FROM booking b LEFT JOIN users u ON u.unum=b.unum LEFT JOIN camping_main m ON m.cnum = b.cnum WHERE b.bnum=#{bnum}
SELECT f.*,in_time,out_time FROM facilities f INNER JOIN camping_main c on f.cnum=c.cnum WHERE c.cnum=#{cnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE booking SET confirm=#{confirm}, name=#{name},phone=#{phone} WHERE bnum=#{bnum}
